org.sobotics.chatexchange.chat.event

Class MessageEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sobotics.chatexchange.chat.event.Event
      • org.sobotics.chatexchange.chat.event.MessageEvent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MessageDeletedEvent, MessageEditedEvent, MessagePostedEvent, MessageStarredEvent, PingMessageEvent

    public abstract class MessageEvent
extends Event
    Represents an event that is the result of an action being performed on a message. This is the base class for all messages type events, like posting, editing, replying, etc.

    The content of the message sent by the chat event is HTML encoded: this class will unescape the HTML entities.

    Author:
    Tunaki

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Message getMessage()
      Returns the message that triggered this event, at the time the event was raised.

      • Methods inherited from class org.sobotics.chatexchange.chat.event.Event

    • Method Detail

      • getMessage

        public Message getMessage()
        Returns the message that triggered this event, at the time the event was raised.

        The returned message will not be updated with regards to, e.g, stars or edits that were made after this event. If an updated message is needed, refer to Room.getMessage(long).

        Returns:
        Message.
